ygData.subject: Re: Topaz, and minor illus
ygData.msgSnippet: yes i bought jade from one of the first girls inside the building in the Arcane science area, where all the magic users are. ... From: Mistywinds
ygData.messageBody:
yes i bought jade from one of the first girls inside the building in the
Arcane science area, where all the magic users are.
